function.name: bookOrder
function.description: Book a new delivery order. Collects addresses, phone, and payment preference.

pickupAddress.description: The full address where the package should be picked up (including unit/apt).

deliveryAddress.description: The full address where the package should be delivered (including unit/apt).

customerPhone.description: The customer's phone number for updates.

pickupName.description: Name of the person at pickup (optional, default: Customer).

deliveryName.description: Name of the person receiving the package (optional, default: Receiver).

driverNotes.description: Special instructions for the driver (e.g., 'Ring doorbell').

function.name: checkOrderStatus
function.description: Check the status of an existing order using the customer's phone number.

customerPhone.description: The customer's phone number to look up orders.

function.name: cancelOrder
function.description: Cancel an existing order using the order reference number.

orderId.description: The 6-digit order reference number provided during booking.
